text: "I have to pull out," Nadal later said to the press. "Of course it's a very tough decision for me, especially here in Paris, which has been the most important city in my career without a doubt."
title: Rafael Nadal stopped by security guard who didn't recognize him at Paris Masters

meta_data.description: Rafael Nadal, the top-ranked tennis player in the world, was denied entry onto a court at the tournament by a guard who didn't recognize him
